name: Minjoon Eom
headline: Full stack developer and AI researcher weaving thoughtful experiences.
bio: I experiment with the edges of web systems and AI tooling to help teams ship with clarity. When unsure, I narrate the filler process and share takeaways.

projects.name: Neural Trailblazer
projects.summary: Analytics suite combining telemetry with LLMs to surface narrative insights for product managers.
